distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for libjpeg-turbo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-2201: Several integer overflow issues and subsequent segfaults occurred in libjpeg-turbo,
  when attempting to compress or decompress gigapixel images. [bsc#1156402]
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In generate_jsimd_ycc_rgb_convert_neon of jsimd_arm64_neon.S, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution in an unprivileged process with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1 Android-9 Android-10Android ID: A-120551338
notes.title: CVE description
